description: Auto-format code files after editing with language-specific tools

hooks.command: if [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *.py ]]; then echo 'ðŸ Formatting Python...'; python -m ruff format "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null || echo 'Ruff not available'; python -m black "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null || echo 'Black not available'; fi

if [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *.js || "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *.ts || "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *.jsx || "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *.tsx ]]; then echo 'âš¡ Formatting JS/TS...'; npx prettier --write "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null || echo 'Prettier not available'; fi

if [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *.json ]]; then echo 'ðŸ“‹ Formatting JSON...'; npx prettier --write "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null || python -m json.tool "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" > temp.json && mv temp.json "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null || echo 'JSON formatting tools not available'; fi
if [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *.go ]]; then echo 'ðŸ”§ Formatting Go...'; go fmt "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null || echo 'Go not available'; fi
if [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *.rs ]]; then echo 'ðŸ¦€ Formatting Rust...'; rustfmt "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null || echo 'Rustfmt not available'; fi
